fields.name: nft
fields.label: Data NFT
fields.help: All metadata is stored on-chain in a newly deployed ERC-721 contract representing this asset, created with this name, symbol, description and image.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.help: Add a thorough description with as much detail as possible. You can use [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/basics). You can change the description at any time. If you provide personal data, please note that it will remain in the transaction history. For more information on how personal data is handled within the metadata, please refer to our [privacy policy](/privacy/en).

fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.help: Give proper attribution for your dataset. You are welcome to use a pseudonym, and you can change your author name at any time. Please note that it will remain in the transaction history. For more information on how personal data is handled within the metadata, please refer to our [privacy policy](/privacy/en).

fields.name: dockerImage
fields.label: Docker Image
fields.help: Please select an image to run your algorithm.

fields.name: dockerImageCustom
fields.label: Custom Docker Image
fields.help: Provide the name and the tag of a public Docker hub image or the custom image if you have it hosted in a 3rd party repository

fields.name: dockerImageChecksum
fields.label: Docker Image Checksum
fields.help: Provide the checksum(DIGEST) of your docker image.

fields.name: dockerImageCustomEntrypoint
fields.label: Docker Image Entrypoint
fields.help: Provide the entrypoint for your algorithm.

fields.name: termsAndConditions
fields.label: Terms & Conditions
options: I agree to the Terms and Conditions

fields.name: dataTokenOptions
fields.label: Datatoken
fields.help: The datatoken used for accessing this asset will be created with this name & symbol.

fields.name: providerUrl
fields.label: Provider URL
fields.help: Enter the URL for your custom [provider](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/provider/) or leave as is to use the default one. If you change your provider URL after adding your file, please add & validate your file again.

fields.title: IPFS
fields.label: CID
fields.help: This CID will be stored encrypted after publishing.
fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

fields.title: Arweave
fields.label: Transaction ID
fields.help: This Transaction ID will be stored encrypted after publishing.
fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

fields.title: URL
fields.label: File
fields.help: This URL will be stored encrypted after publishing. **Please make sure that the endpoint is accessible over the internet and is not protected by a firewall or by credentials.**
fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

innerFields.title: Headers
innerFields.label: Headers
innerFields.help: This HEADERS will be stored encrypted after publishing.

fields.help: This URL will be stored encrypted after publishing.

innerFields.title: Query

innerFields.help: This QUERY will be stored encrypted after publishing.

fields.label: Address
fields.help: This ADDRESS will be stored encrypted after publishing.
fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

innerFields.title: ABI
innerFields.label: ABI
innerFields.help: This ABI will be stored encrypted after publishing.

fields.title: URL
fields.label: File

fields.computeHelp: For a compute dataset, your file should match the file type required by the algorithm, and should not exceed 1 GB in file size.

fields.name: algorithmPrivacy
fields.label: Algorithm Privacy
options: Keep my algorithm private for Compute-to-Data
fields.help: By default, your algorithm can be downloaded for free or a fixed price, in addition to running in compute jobs. Enabling this option will prevent downloading, so your algorithm can only be run as part of a compute job on a dataset.

fields.name: access
fields.label: Access Type
fields.help: Choose how you want your files to be accessible for the specified price.
fields.disclaimer: Please do not provide downloadable personal data without the consent of the data subjects.

fields.name: timeout
fields.label: Timeout
fields.help: Define how long buyers should be able to download the dataset again after the initial purchase.

fields.name: dummy content, actual content is defined under 'create' key in ../price.json
